title: Inception
description: A thief with the ability to enter people's dreams takes on one last job: planting an ea into someone's subconscious.

title: Interstellar
description: A group of astronauts travels through a wormhole in search of a new habitable planet for humanity.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman battles the Joker, who seeks to create chaos in Gotham City.

title: Avengers: Endgame
description: The Avengers assemble one last time to undo the devastating effects of Thanos' snap.

title: Parasite
description: A poor family infiltrates the lives of a wealthy household, leading to unexpected consequences.

title: The Godfather
description: The story of the powerful Corleone crime family and its patriarch, Vito Corleone.

title: Titanic
description: A tragic love story set aboard the ill-fated RMS Titanic.

title: The Matrix
description: A computer hacker discovers the truth about reality and joins a rebellion against the machines.

title: Shawshank Redemption
description: A man sentenced to life imprisonment finds hope and redemption in an unlikely place.

title: Joker
description: The origin story of the Joker, depicting his descent into madness and crime.
